sentences.en: As they got to the sheetrock stage, he was walking around and noticed an unused alcove.
sentences.cn: 到了安装非承重墙的时候, 他四处走动,注意到一处没用上的小角落.

sentences.en: Boxes, alcove posts , beds , construction fittings, cabinets and plywood. Beautiful heartwood for sliced veneer.
sentences.cn: 箱物家俱、车只类角材、内销用合板之面 、 中、底板、大径木之心材可作平切单板.

sentences.en: He left the alcove in despair.
sentences.cn: 他绝望地离开了数学部.

sentences.en: His desk was in an alcove to one side of the chimney.
sentences.cn: 他的书桌在一间凹室内,一边是烟囱.

sentences.en: In the alcoves on either side of the fire were bookshelves.
sentences.cn: 凹室内炉火的两侧是书架。

sentences.en: In this alcove were Gielgud, Alec Guinness and other distinguished actors.
sentences.cn: 当时里面坐着吉尔吉德 、 亚历克·吉尼斯等著名演员.
这凹进去的地方有一张长沙发.

sentences.en: The bed fits neatly into the alcove.
The Bishop installed his guest in the alcove.
sentences.cn: 主教把他的客人安顿在壁厢里.

sentences.en: The bookcase fits neatly into the alcove.
The frosted - glass partition in the alcove slid back and a pair of eyes scrutinized me carefully.
sentences.cn: 接待室的毛玻璃挡板拉开了,有一双眼睛仔细地审视着我.

sentences.en: Use scope: wooden road , alcove, grape frame, guardrail etc. all indoors or outdoors wooden production.
sentences.cn: 使用范围: 木质栈道,凉亭, 葡萄架, 护栏等一切室内外木制品.

sentences.en: We partitioned off the alcove to make another Bedroom.
sentences.cn: 我们把凹室分隔开作另一间卧室.

sentences.en: When the alcove was a large serge curtain drawn from wall to wall concealed the altar.
sentences.cn: 壁厢里有人住时,他总把一方大哗叽帷布拉开,遮住神座.

trans.tran_cn: 凹室，壁龛，（花园）凉亭，<古>僻静处
trans.tran_en: a place in the wall of a room that is built further back than the rest of the wall
